attributes.action: Control Umbrella Companies to STOP Steal Money and Discriminate any Workers
attributes.additional_details: Umbrella Companies discriminate every worker and stealing money from them. They feed as parasite on hard working people. Government created path for Umbrella Companies due want to STOP TAX avoidance. That's fair enough, but now they discriminate every worker working threw Umbrella Companies to pay for Payslip, Employer National Insurance Contribution and any Hidden Charges. Working threw Agency I'm not self employed. I don't have to pay for Accountants or Pay Employers Statutory Costs.
attributes.background: To Scrap or Control Umbrella Companies what they can do and what they have to do. To STOP Umbrella Companies stealing money from workers. To STOP discrimination between workers to give worker working threw Umbrella Companies right to have free of charge payslip.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about umbrella companies, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what new requirements you want to be imposed on umbrella companies.
